title: Use sgplot defaults. — use_sgplot
text: default_grid 'x', 'y', 'xy' 'none' determine grid lines drawn. Defaults 'y'. default_colour Default colour/fill geoms. Default value 'dark-blue' sgplot::sg_colour_values.

title: Use sgplot defaults. — use_sgplot
code: library(ggplot2)  d <- subset(mpg, manufacturer == "ford")  ggplot(d, aes(x = model)) + geom_bar()  ggplot(d, aes(x = model, fill = class)) + geom_bar()   use_sgplot() #> ℹ Default ggplot2 theme set to `theme_sg`. #> ℹ Default colours set. #> ℹ Default geom aesthetics set.  ggplot(d, aes(x = model)) + geom_bar()  ggplot(d, aes(x = model, fill = class, colour = class)) + geom_bar()
